channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- GPU Display Driver, vGPU Software, Cloud Gaming
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- GPU Display Driver, vGPU Software, Cloud Gaming

item.title: CVE-2024-0107|2024-08-08T16:57:49.154Z -- nvidia -- gpu%20display%20driver%2C%20vgpu%20software%2C%20cloud%20gaming
item.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in the user mode layer, where an unprivileged regular user can cause an out-of-bounds read. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to code execution, denial of service, escalation of privileges, information disclosure, and data tampering.
